medical_history.chief_complaint: Patient presented with depigmented patches over almost his entire body and a white forelock.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The depigmented patches developed immediately after birth and spread symmetrically on the trunk and on the inner aspects of the upper and lower extremities.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Patient was diagnosed with Hirschsprung disease at age 2, treated with a colostomy and Duhamel operation.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's mother had similar depigmented patches.
